title: Crossover: Devil's Due MC and Vipers Creed MC Prequel
description: Two motorcycle clubs, two different reasons for being, and one lifestyle find each other together. Devil’s Due MCRespect is earned, never freely given.Our road is a path for justice.Nomads always on the open highway, we follow the trail, no matter where it leads, everyone be damned.Vipers Creed MCRespect is hard earned.Live by the creed, die by the creed.If you aren’t with us, you’re against us. If you step into our world, your balls better be big and your cock even bigger. Brothers, bikes, and bitches collide.Respect is everything.When two clubs cross over into each other’s worlds, only madness, mayhem, vengeance, and heat can possibly ensue. This is a cross over novella between two established MC series by Chelsea Camaron and Ryan Michele.This story takes place before the series begins so it is not necessary to read anything before this book.This work of fiction contains violence, language, and situations intended for mature audiences. This is not meant to be an exact depiction of life in a motorcycle club, but rather a work of fiction meant to entertain.
author: Chelsea Camaron
